summary: AN ORDINANCE revising the 2001 annual budget and accounts by decreasing certain expenditure allowances and increasing certain other expenditure allowances in the 2001 budgets of various City departments and agencies from various City funds to provide for costs and expenses not provided for in the 2001 Budget; authorizing the acceptance of certain monies; appropriating, re-appropriating, and transferring money from various City funds and subfunds; and authorizing the abrogation and creation of certain positions; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
